name: Kettletron 9000
short_description: The Kettletron 9000 is a simple PID (Proportional, Integral, Derivative) shield for the Arduino microcontroller, with control program for the PC and using thermistors or one-wire DS18B20 sensors.  Optional add-ons include an LCD to display current status, a rotary encoder for changing the target temp, or a BluetoothMate bluetooth modem for control via Android handset.  Cook steaks in a kettle, smoke ribs in a flowerpot, or make yogurt in a mason jar--the Kettletron 9000 is the most surprisingly useful thing you're likely to solder up today!
summary: The Kettletron 9000, a PID controller for the Arduino
